person.persName: Remus Gibson (Ohio County, Kentucky, grocer, jailer, and state representative)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, grocer, jailer, and state representative. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza C. Williams Gibson in Ohio County, Kentucky, on August 15, 1850. Father to Reison C. Gibson, William A. Gibson, Carrie A. Gibson, Frank B. Gibson, Eliza C. Gibson, and Mary B. Gibson. Bar keeper in Ohio County in 1850. Grocer and jailer in Ohio County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Ohio County in 1860. Served in the Kentucky General Assembly as the representative from Ohio County from September 2, 1861 to March 3, 1863.
